title: Ubisoft Responds to "Deceptive Marketing" Claims for Latest Might & Magic Game
text:
Ubisoft Responds to "Deceptive Marketing" Claims for Latest Might & Magic Game 
Published By: Gamespot.com - Today 
Ubisoft has responded to claims of "deceptive marketing" tactics for the recent release of Might & Magic Heroes VII's collector's edition, a...
